lessons.title: Basic Greetings
lessons.description: Learn how to greet people in English
lessons.transcript: Hello! My name is Sarah. Nice to meet you. How are you today? I'm doing great, thank you!

questions.questionText: What is the man doing right now?
questions.explanation: The speaker clearly says 'I've been good. I'm in school right now'

questions.questionText: Which school does the men go to?
questions.explanation: The speaker says 'I go to PCC'

questions.questionText: What does the woman say to the man at the end of the conversation?
questions.optionA: Good luck with your new job

lessons.title: Daily Routine
lessons.transcript: I wake up at 7 AM every day. First, I brush my teeth and take a shower. Then I have breakfast with my family. After that, I go to school at 8 AM.

questions.questionText: What time does the speaker wake up?
questions.explanation: The speaker says 'I wake up at 7 AM'

questions.questionText: What does the speaker do first after waking up?
What time does the speaker go to school?
questions.explanation: The speaker goes to school at 8 AM

lessons.title: Shopping at the Mall
lessons.transcript:
Customer: Excuse me, how much is this blue jacket?
Salesperson: It's $45, but we have a 20% discount today.
Customer: That's great! I'll take it. Do you accept credit cards?
Salesperson: Yes, we do. Cash and credit cards are both fine.

questions.questionText: How much is the jacket originally?

questions.explanation: The customer asks about 'this blue jacket'
Both cash and credit cards are accepted

lessons.title: Weather Forecast
lessons.transcript: Good morning! Here's today's weather forecast. It will be sunny in the morning with temperatures around 25 degrees Celsius. In the afternoon, we expect some clouds and the temperature will rise to 30 degrees. There's a 40% chance of rain in the evening, so don't forget your umbrella!

questions.questionText: How will the morning weather be?
questions.explanation: It will be sunny in the morning
40% chance of rain in the evening

lessons.title: Job Interview
lessons.description: A conversation during a job interview
lessons.transcript:
Interviewer: Thank you for coming, Mr. Johnson. Can you tell me about your previous work experience?
Candidate: Certainly. I worked as a marketing manager for five years at Tech Solutions Inc. I was responsible for developing marketing strategies and managing a team of ten people. We successfully increased sales by 35% during my tenure.
interviewer: That's impressive. Why are you interested in joining our company?
Candidate: I've been following your company's growth for the past two years. I'm particularly interested in your innovative approach to digital marketing, and I believe my experience would be valuable to your team.

questions.questionText: What was the candidate's previous position?
questions.explanation: He worked as a marketing manager

questions.questionText: How long did he work at his previous company?
How many people did he manage?
questions.explanation: He managed a team of ten people

questions.questionText: By how much did sales increase?
How long has he been following the company?
questions.explanation: He's been following for the past two years
